textos_fuente.text: Contact Us – Aroha Services Home Services Aged Care Staffing NDIS – Disability Services Childcare Staffing Facilities Management About Us 1300 800 876 Contact Us Register Now Find a job Find staff Contact Us Contact Us Contact our friendly team by completing the form and we will get in touch with you at the earliest. First Name (Required) Last Name* (Required) Company Name Job Title Email Phone* (Required) Location Industry Industry Mining Healthcare Others (Please Type Below) Healthcare Enquiry Type Enquiry Type Looking to Hire Request for a Proposal Careers Bookings Request Media & Press Payroll Query Other (Please Type Below) Mining Enquiry Type Enquiry Type Looking to Hire Request for a Proposal Careers Bookings Request Media & Press Payroll Query Other (Please Type Below) Other Enquiry Type Enquiry Type Looking to Hire Request for a Proposal Careers Bookings Request Media & Press Payroll Query Other (Please Type Below) Enter other industry Enter other enquiry type Message CAPTCHA Frequently asked questions FAQ's bubble_chart Where do I learn about COVID-19 restrictions and policy? Visit the WA Government website for the most up-to-date information. bubble_chart How can I contact Aroha Services? To speak with one of our team members you may call us on 1300 800 876 or Contact Us. bubble_chart How can I apply for a position at Aroha? To join our team, please register here and one of our Recruitment team members will reach out to you. Should you need to discuss your application with one of our recruitment officer, please contact us on 1300 800 876 or email recruitment@arohacaregroup.com.au bubble_chart How soon can I start working? For Casual workers, you may start ASAP or as per the requirement of the client. For Short Term Contract or Permanent Employment, the commencement date will be advised by the client. How can I get shifts through Aroha? You can pick and choose your own shifts at Aroha using our user-friendly app and as part of your onboarding, we will show you how to use your members app. Will I receive a response to my job application? Yes. You will receive a response to your job application upon submission and one of our team members will get in touch with you for Phone screening. I have problems submitting my application. One of the common issues why your application is not going through is because your details are already in our system or has previously applied for a position with us. Please contact our friendly team members to review your profile. Thank you! bubble_chart How does Aroha Services conduct pre-employment screenings for employers? Aroha Services know each employer has different needs, so we’re equipped to handle many kinds of pre-employment screening and testing. While the exact cost will depend on the nature of the screening, we’re proud to provide pre-employment evaluations at a fair price for your requirement/market industry. From federal and local background checks to a variety of different drug testing options, we administer a multiple of evaluations to give you the peace of mind you need to make a great hire. bubble_chart I’m an employer looking to make a direct hire or temporary one. If you’re an employer looking to fill mostly leadership or administration roles, a direct hire may be the best way to go. It will give you access to a larger network of potential candidates and a talent pool that includes both passive and active job seekers. Alternatively, if you know a vacancy will only last for a short amount of time – e.g. annual leave, long service leave, maternity leave or preparing for a season of increased demand – a temp or temp-to-hire placement would be suitable. This allows you more time to evaluate a candidate to see if they are the right fit for your team before making a lasting commitment. bubble_chart I’m looking for an immediate start for a shift cover or temporary cover in my facility. Who do I contact? If you’re looking for support to cover your shifts, please contact us on (08) 6477 9823 and our friendly Bookings Team can assist in filling your requirements. bubble_chart What sectors do you specialise in? Aroha Services deliver Permanent, Temporary and Casual Staffing solutions across Australia in the following sectors: Aged Care Healthcare Disability Early Childhood Education Facilities Management Find a Job Find Staff Facilities Management Aged Care About Us Contact Us Register Now 1300 800 876 Aroha Services is a staffing agency located in Perth, Western Australia. We provide staffing and recruitment services to Hospitals, Aged Care Facilities and Mining service providers. Our staffs are Highly Skilled, Experienced and Qualified professionals in healthcare and mining industry. We customise our services to match the client’s requirements. Copyright © 2025 Aroha Services Website powered by PWD Digital Agency Privacy Policy Menu

About Us | The Easton Rooftop Pool & Lounge 954-715-2617 About Us Hours & Location Events Book a Private Party Blog CONTACT US About Us Hours & Location Events Book a Private Party Blog About Us Who We Are The Easton in Fort Lauderdale is your favorite place to relax on a sun-dripped day. The ocean breeze from the east cools you and your friends on our 12,000 square foot pool deck complete with daybeds to lounge on.  Enjoy the sweeping views of the ever-growing city of Fort Lauderdale with an expertly crafted cocktail in hand. The music sets the tone for the unforgettable evening ahead. Whether you find yourself poolside with al fresco bites or you find love on the dance floor in our 3,000 square foot lounge, The Easton is where you feel most alive. The service is friendly, unpretentious and unobtrusive, yet is unparalleled to any other venue in the market. You feel at home when you see warm smiling faces greet you at your every visit. The team at The Easton in Fort Lauderdale makes ordinary experiences extraordinary simply by going that extra step. Cheers to making memorable moments time and time again at your favorite rooftop venue . EXPLORE FURTHER CABANA RENTALS MONTHLY EVENTS PRIVATE PARTIES NEWSLETTER SIGN UP Name First Last Email Everything You Want To Know About The Easton Is The Easton 21 and over only? No, The Easton is open to all ages unless otherwise specified for a special event. Is The Easton open to the public? Yes! The Easton is open to the public unless otherwise specified for a private event. Do I enter through the hotel to get there? No. The Easton has our own separate entrance! The hotel entrance is only available for use by hotel guests. Please follow the street, past the Courtyard Fort Lauderdale hotel entrance, and find the elevator to the Easton. Proceed up to the 9th floor! Where do I park and is there a fee? There is street parking available in the surrounding neighborhood, as well as valet parking at the Courtyard Fort Lauderdale hotel. Valet parking is validated for patrons of The Easton. Is smoking allowed on the pool deck? No, smoking is not allowed on the pool deck; including cigars. Is there a cover? It depends on the event! There is no daily cover fee or for our Saturday and Sunday Splash Pool Parties, but we do sometimes have a cover on Friday nights and for special events. Please see our events page for more details. Is outside food or drink allowed? Outside food or drink is not allowed during operating hours at The Easton. Are you hiring? To see any available positions, please visit our careers page. LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR PRIVATE EVENT SPACE FOR ROOFTOP PARTY Discover the ultimate rooftop pool lounge experience and uncover what makes our lounge the perfect spot for relaxation and entertainment . Learn more about our luxurious amenities, exceptional food , service, and stunning views on our About page. Plan your visit today and elevate your lounging experience to new heights! Gallery See What Our Customers Are Saying! The Easton Rooftop Pool + Lounge 721 N Federal Hwy, Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33304 HOURS Monday-Tuesday | Closed Wednesday – Thursday | 3:00 pm to 10:00 pm Friday – Saturday | 11:00 am to 12:00 am Sunday | 11:00 am to 10:00 pm PHONE 954-715-2617 SITEMAP 2025

Hotel Effie | New Luxury Hotel Miramar Beach Destin FL Skip to main content Top Menu 75°F Sunset Webcam All About Effie Events FAQ Photo Gallery Pet Lovers Contact Us 1-850-351-3000 Main navigation Accommodations Discover Our Rooms Explore Our Suites Accessible Rooms & Suites Dining Ovide Ara Rooftop Pool & Lounge The Lobby Bar (TLB) In-Room Dining Sweetbay Coffee Spa Lilliana Meetings Weddings Offers Things to Do Beach & Water Golf Events Calendar Stay Active Nightlife Local Attractions Escape to Wonderland: A Twisted Tea Halloween Party Book Check Availability Arrival Date Departure Date Guests Adults Children A Luxury Hotel in Miramar Beach Unlike Any Other. You’ll find an extraordinary treasure nestled between the white sandy beaches and emerald green water of the Gulf Coast and the living shorelines of Choctawhatchee Bay in Northwest Florida. Vibrant and elegant, comfortable and refined. A beautiful, new luxury 250-room hotel. Welcome to Hotel Effie Sandestin, Autograph Collection. Slide 1 Slide 2 Slide 3 Slide 4 Luxury Rooms & Suites Experience southern elegance with thoughtful design and exquisite detail. A fresh take on a coastal Florida hotel featuring smart solutions for the modern traveler. Taking inspiration from the locale, our fully appointed rooms and suites will welcome guests with a complement of amenities View Rooms View Suites Slide 1 Slide 2 Slide 3 Gourmet Eats Indulge in the epitome of culinary refinement at Ovide, where every moment beckons to be adorned with celebration. This is no ordinary hotel restaurant, a travel experience miles above the rest, showcasing food and local flavors of Gulf Coast. Explore our restaurants Slide 1 Slide 2 Slide 3 Extensive Meeting Spaces Beautiful touches like hand-curated fixtures and custom carpets add a tasteful backdrop to events. In all, 20,000+ square feet of extraordinary meeting space, including a 13,000 square foot ballroom, that can be seamlessly integrated with our existing Baytowne Conference Center. No detail is overlooked so you concentrate on the business at hand. Learn More 20,000 sq. ft. of venues including a 13,000 sq. ft. ballroom. Slide 1 Slide 2 Slide 3 Beautiful Weddings Made for romance, Hotel Effie takes its inspiration from its breathtaking locale. Sandy limestone, natural textures, echoes of dunes and the water. And a team who is ready to make your wish their command. Surround yourself with the ones you love…and every possible amenity. The best is yet to be. Learn More Spa Lilliana Soothing spa treatments. Personalized attention. A variety of flexible spaces whether you’re looking for a calming massage on your own, a romantic escape, or an afternoon with the girls, expect beauty, comfort, and a memorable experience. Learn More Rooftop Pool Elevate your seaside experience with a relaxing afternoon by the only rooftop pool on Florida’s Emerald Coast. Panoramic views from the bay to the Gulf of Mexico, full-service bar with fine wines and hand-crafted cocktails, sunshine and sea breezes. Learn More Stay Connected Follow Us Twitter Instagram Facebook Frequently Asked Questions What time is check-in and check-out? Check-in is at 4 PM, and check-out is at 11 AM. Can I request an early check-in or late check-out? Yes, early check-in and late check-out are available based on availability and may be subject to a fee. What parking options are available? We offer self-parking for $25/day and valet parking for $32/day. EV charging stations on property and accessible through valet services for additonal $20.0 0 What’s the closest airport to Hotel Effie? Destin-Fort Walton Beach Airport (VPS) is the closest, about 30 miles away. Pensacola International Airport (PNS) is about 1.5 hours away . Are there airport shuttle services? We do not offer a hotel-operated shuttle, but transportation options are available from both airports . Are housekeeping services available? Yes, daily housekeeping services are provided. Is there a resort charge? Yes, a $45 resort fee includes bicycle, kayak, and boogie board rentals, resort shuttle service, tennis court access, golf discounts, and more. Does Hotel Effie offer dry cleaning services? Yes, dry cleaning services are available. Is the Hotel Effie pet-friendly? Yes, we welcome all well-mannered and fully trained dogs weighing up to 65 lbs. What is your cancellation policy? Cancellation policies vary by rate and package; please refer to your booking confirmation or contact the hotel for details. What is Hotel Effie’s smoking policy? Hotel Effie is a smoke-free property. 1 Grand Sandestin Boulevard Miramar Beach, FL 32550 1-833-873-3343 Facebook Instagram LinkedIn Footer menu Stay Dining Beach Careers Sustainability Meetings Weddings Spa FAQ Subscribe to Email All About Effie Blog Contact Us Press & News Virtual Tour Sandestin® is 50 Getting Here Terms of Use Global Privacy Policy Accessibility Sandestin® Rental Management Copyright 2023 Hotel Effie Sandestin Close Main navigation Accommodations Discover Our Rooms Explore Our Suites Accessible Rooms & Suites Dining Ovide Ara Rooftop Pool & Lounge The Lobby Bar (TLB) In-Room Dining Sweetbay Coffee Spa Lilliana Meetings Weddings Offers Things to Do Beach & Water Golf Events Calendar Stay Active Nightlife Local Attractions Escape to Wonderland: A Twisted Tea Halloween Party Top Menu Sunset Webcam All About Effie Events FAQ Photo Gallery Pet Lovers Contact Us 1-850-351-3000

Privacy Terms & Conditions Terms of Use Overview Spaces Press Nearby Hotels Ara Rooftop Bar / Club 1 Grand Sandestin Blvd, Miramar Beach, FL 32550, United States Ara Rooftop 1 Grand Sandestin Blvd, Miramar Beach, FL 32550, United States Request Pricing # of Spaces 2 Space s On the top floor of Hotel Effie, Ara Rooftop Pool & Lounge awaits. Named for the southern constellation, Ara is both a luxurious pool experience and a stylish rooftop lounge where you’ll find the finest wines, hand-crafted artisanal cocktails, and a delicious menu from famed chef Hugh Acheson. 

Kick back in a private cabana or enjoy a game of life-size chess, Connect 4, or cornhole. After sundown, the fun, relaxing vibe eases into a cool, hip one. And let’s not forget those panoramic views from the top. Easton Rooftop Pool and Lounge in Fort Lauderdale Ushers in New Management Team | Lifestyle Media Group SOUTH FLORIDA BUSINESS & WEALTH MAGAZINE Digital Magazine Skip to content Main Navigation Lifestyle Media Group Search for: Sections Arts & Culture Ask the Experts Community and Philanthropy Editor’s Choice Cover Stories Editor’s Choice Local Business Good Press Industries Industries Community & Philanthropy Fashion and Retail Fashion and Retail Health Care & Wellness Hospitality Real Estate Retail Travel & Recreation Food & Drink Featured Restaurants Food & Drink Nightlife People Profiles A&E Spotlight People Profiles Local Buzz Around Town Local Buzz Things To Do Web Extras About Lifestyle Media Advertise With Us Contact Us Digital Publications Meet The Team Subscribe Social Media Connect Our Other Brands South Florida's largest single-title brand Subscribe Header Navigation Editor’s Choice Cover Stories Industries Travel & Recreation Real Estate Community and Philanthropy Arts & Culture Fashion and Retail Health Care & Wellness Good Press Food & Drink Featured Restaurants People Profiles A&E Spotlight Events Local Buzz Things To Do Ask the Experts About Us Contact Us Meet The Team Advertise With Us Web Extras Easton Rooftop Pool and Lounge in Fort Lauderdale Ushers in New Management Team June 1, 2022 | Lifestyle Staff The Easton Rooftop Pool & Lounge recently hired Warren Zinn as Food and Beverage Asset Director of Prime Group, the owner of the Fort Lauderdale venue and Mubashir “Mo” Qureshi as General Manager of The Easton Rooftop. “We had a national executive search to find these two highly qualified gentlemen for our ever-growing customer base at The Easton Rooftop Pool and Lounge,” Heather Strauss says, Director of Hotel Asset Management at Prime Group. “We are thrilled to welcome them just in time for all our summer events and promotions.” Warren Zinn Zinn has over 25 years of experience in the food and beverage industry. He previously served as Area Director of Food and Beverage at Shamin Hotels, a group of five oceanfront hotels in Virginia Beach. Zinn was also the Corporate Director of Food and Beverage at GoldKey PHR, a hospitality management group and served as the Director of Food and Beverage at Waldorf Astoria Casa Marina and Reach Resorts in Key West. He also owned and managed Daryl Wine Bar & Restaurant in New Brunswick, New Jersey. Qureshi previously worked as Manager of CVI.CHE 105 Kendall and Downtown Miami and Hiro Japanese Restaurant in North Miami Beach. He has also served as Assistant General Manager at Sal’s Italian Ristorante in Pembroke Pines and as a bartender and General Manager at Bennigan’s in Miami. Mubashir “Mo” Qureshi “I have worked in the service industry for most of my professional career in every position from dishwasher to management,” Qureshi says. “I have accumulated ample customer service experience, vendor relationships, and staff management. I believe in teamwork and sustained growth.” The Easton Rooftop Pool & Lounge at 721 North Federal Highway is located in Quantum Village atop the Marriott Courtyard in downtown Fort Lauderdale. The ninth-floor rooftop indoor-outdoor bar, lounge, day club and nightclub features guest DJs, performers, live events and entertainment. The Easton’s rooftop offers views throughout Fort Lauderdale, including the beach, for ideal daytime and evening vistas.
